subject.description: Young woman with fair skinned tone.
subject.hair: Long straight blonde hair extending past the waist, styled with a pink tropical flower tucked behind the left ear.
subject.expression: Calm, relaxed expression, looking slightly off-camera.

attire.pattern: White base with a vibrant floral print featuring red, yellow, and orange flowers with green leaves.

pose.body_position: Sitting on white sand, legs extended diagonally toward the bottom left, leaning back on left hand for support.
pose.hand_placement: Right hand raised, gently touching the neck/shoulder area.
pose.orientation: Full body visible, angled slightly toward the right.

environment.location: Tropical bali beach with white sand and clear turquoise water.
environment.background: Deep blue sky with faint clouds. Two distinct island peaks visible on the horizon line.
environment.details: Gentle waves washing onto the shore. Distant figures of people swimming and walking on the beach.

lighting_and_atmosphere.lighting: Bright, direct natural sunlight creating high contrast and sharp shadows on the sand.
lighting_and_atmosphere.color_palette: Vibrant blues, warm sand tones, natural skin tones, bright floral colors.

technical_specifications.quality: 4k, Ultra HD, high resolution, highly detailed texture.
technical_specifications.focus: Sharp focus on the subject with slightly softer background depth.
